summary: Various min/max pickpocket chance edits. Use only one, or you may not get the desired settings.
descriptionHtml:
Select which ever version suits your needs (only one), if what you want isn't here message me the values you want and I'll make it cuz I'm cool like that.

Requirements:
Skyrim.

If you upload pics of it in action I'll give you a virtual high five. Or something.

Should be compatible with all mods, unless they also edit the min/max pickpocket chance. Which would be dumb to have 2 of. Just run BOSS and you should be golden. You probably dont even need to run BOSS for this, as long as it's under skyrim.esm and update.esm it should work.

Made with SkyEdit, because creation kit (I refuse to capitalize that wretched thing) is a POS. You can get SkyEdit here: http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Tes5Mod:SkyEdit
But please note that it is no longer being updated, and probably has a few bugs, but at least it's not as bad as ck.

Not much else I can say, go grab Sneak Tools or something. and Skyui. Yeah.

Mods in screenshot (recommended but not required): 

The Ningheim Race: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?

Sneak Tools: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19447/?

SkyUI: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?

Extended Carryweight: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31173/?


Yes I realize I misspelled Jol'inar, I shall do my best to atone for the smearing of her memory.  


Feel free to do whatever you want with it, kopimi for the win! http://www.kopimi.com/

I've just gotten into modding, and I'd love to make more mods! I just have no idea what people want, so if there is a small mod or tweak you want made
You can message me at: romanthe9000th@gmail.com or on the Nexus Forums.
author: Roman9000
